00061 class HelpersHBEFA {
00062 public:
00069     static SUMOReal computeCO(SUMOEmissionClass c, double v, double a) ;
00070 
00071 
00078     static SUMOReal computeCO2(SUMOEmissionClass c, double v, double a) ;
00079 
00080 
00087     static SUMOReal computeHC(SUMOEmissionClass c, double v, double a) ;
00088 
00089 
00096     static SUMOReal computeNOx(SUMOEmissionClass c, double v, double a) ;
00097 
00098 
00105     static SUMOReal computePMx(SUMOEmissionClass c, double v, double a) ;
00106 
00107 
00117     static SUMOReal computeFuel(SUMOEmissionClass c, double v, double a) ;
00118 
00119 
00120 private:
00132     static inline SUMOReal compute(SUMOEmissionClass c, const int offset, double v, const double a) {
00133         switch (c) {
00134             case SVE_ZERO_EMISSIONS:
00135                 return 0.;
00136             case SVE_UNKNOWN:
00137                 c = SVE_P_LDV_7_7;
00138                 break;
00139             default:
00140                 break;
00141         }
00142         v *= 3.6;
00143         if (c > 42) {
00144             const double* f = myFunctionParameter[c - 42] + offset;
00145             return (SUMOReal) MAX2((f[0] + f[3] * v + f[4] * v * v + f[5] * v * v * v) / 3.6, 0.);
00146         }
00147         if (a < 0.) {
00148             return 0.;
00149         }
00150         const double* f = myFunctionParameter[c] + offset;
00151         const double alpha = asin(a / 9.81) * 180. / PI;
00152         return (SUMOReal) MAX2((f[0] + f[1] * alpha * v + f[2] * alpha * alpha * v + f[3] * v + f[4] * v * v + f[5] * v * v * v) / 3.6, 0.);
00153     }
00154 
00155 
00156 private:
00158     static double myFunctionParameter[42][36];
00159 
00160 };
00161 
00162 
00163 #endif
